Song: Usura Thirudi Pora
Singers: Sriram Parthasarathy, Bhavadharini
Movie: Konjam Veyil Konjam Mazhai

Usura Thirudi Pora Oruthi, Ada ullukulla vezhakka poruthi

Ennakuthaan enna aachu, Manasukul nooraal pechu

En Usura Thirudi Pora Oruthan, En orakkam kedutha paasakirukkan

Allipoo maraala, aala konnu poravale

Mulikindra nerangal, munnale nee vendum
Eppodhum unnai padikka
Anbukku vayirillai, aanaalum pasikkum
Anuvellaam koodi thudikka,
Kollaivaal konda azhagae azhagae
Kuridhiyil kaadhal kalandhaaye
